title: Who am I?
kicker: I firmly believe in the power of lifelong learning, starting small, and steadily growing from there.

title: About me
kicker: I'm passionate about creating  digital experiences, and this portfolio is a testament to my dedication to this craft. Feel free to explore my projects and get to know more about my skills and aspirations.

extra.data: While my initial path involved creating educational digital content, I discovered a profound passion for the art of web development and design. I immersed myself in learning languages like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and as my proficiency grew, so did my excitement for frontend development.

title: My career so far
kicker: With nearly 20 years of experience in the digital industry, I've operated at both strategic and operational levels within different areas.

extra.data: I enjoy working in a process-oriented manner and continuously improving work methodologies that drive progress. Much of my previous knowledge has been carried over into my role as a frontend developer.
